mapper.select: select uploadImageName, storeImageName from products where productId=#{productId}
mapper.update: update products set uploadImageName=#{uploadImageName}, storeImageName=#{storeImageName}, productName=#{productName}, productContents=#{productContents}, price=#{price}, quantity=#{quantity} where productId=#{productId}
mapper.select: select * from (select productId, uploadImageName, storeImageName, productName, productContents, price, quantity from products order by productId desc) as T1 limit #{skip}, #{amount}
